languages.text: Whenever Nemesite's ally is killed by an enemy, as soon as that enemy's {g|Encyclopedia:Turn}turn{/g} ends, Nemesite immediately attacks that enemy and grants his allies a +5 {g|Encyclopedia:Bonus}bonus{/g} to all their {g|Encyclopedia:Characteristic}characteristics{/g} until the end of combat. Stacks.

traits.locale_text: When an ally is killed by enemy, after the killer's turn Nemezit grants all allies +5 to all stats until the end of combat and immediately attacks the killer.

Whenever Nemesite's ally is killed by an enemy, as soon as that enemy's turn ends, Nemesite immediately attacks that enemy and grants all his allies a stacking +5 bonus to all their characteristics until the end of combat.

Whenever Nemesite's ally is killed by an enemy, as soon as that enemy's turn ends, Nemesite immediately attacks that enemy and grants all his allies a stacking +5 bonus to all their characteristics until the end of combat.

Whenever Nemesite's ally is killed by an enemy, as soon as that enemy's turn ends, Nemesite immediately attacks that enemy and grants his allies a +5 bonus to all their characteristics until the end of combat. Stacks.

Whenever Nemesite's ally is killed by an enemy, as soon as that enemy's {g|Encyclopedia:Turn}turn{/g} ends, Nemesite immediately attacks that enemy and grants his allies a +5 {g|Encyclopedia:Bonus}bonus{/g} to all their {g|Encyclopedia:Characteristic}characteristics{/g} until the end of combat. Stacks.

Whenever Nemesite's ally is killed by an enemy, as soon as that enemy's {g|Encyclopedia:Turn}turn{/g} ends, Nemesite immediately attacks that enemy and grants his allies a +5 {g|Encyclopedia:Bonus}bonus{/g} to all their {g|Encyclopedia:Characteristic}characteristics{/g} until the end of combat. Stacks.

languages.text: Cuando un aliado de Nemesitio muere a manos de un enemigo, en cuanto el {g|Encyclopedia:Turn}turno{/g} del enemigo termina, Nemesitio ataca inmediatamente al enemigo y concede a sus aliados una {g|Encyclopedia:Bonus}bonificación{/g} +5 a todas sus {g|Encyclopedia:Characteristic}características{/g} hasta el final del combate. Este efecto es acumulativo.
languages.original_text: Whenever Nemesite's ally is killed by an enemy, as soon as that enemy's {g|Encyclopedia:Turn}turn{/g} ends, Nemesite immediately attacks that enemy and grants his allies a +5 {g|Encyclopedia:Bonus}bonus{/g} to all their {g|Encyclopedia:Characteristic}characteristics{/g} until the end of combat. Stacks.

traits.locale_text: Cuando un aliado de Nemesitio muere a manos de un enemigo, en cuanto el {g|Encyclopedia:Turn}turno{/g} del enemigo termina, Nemesitio ataca inmediatamente al enemigo y concede a sus aliados una {g|Encyclopedia:Bonus}bonificación{/g} +5 a todas sus {g|Encyclopedia:Characteristic}características{/g} hasta el final del combate. Este efecto es acumulativo.

languages.text: ネメサイトの味方が敵に倒されるたび、その敵の{g|Encyclopedia:Turn}ターン{/g}が終わると直ちに、ネメサイトはその敵をすぐに攻撃する。ネメサイトの味方は戦闘が終了するまで、自分の{g|Encyclopedia:Characteristic}特性{/g}すべてに+5{g|Encyclopedia:Bonus}ボーナス{/g}を得る。この効果はスタックする。
languages.original_text: Whenever Nemesite's ally is killed by an enemy, as soon as that enemy's {g|Encyclopedia:Turn}turn{/g} ends, Nemesite immediately attacks that enemy and grants his allies a +5 {g|Encyclopedia:Bonus}bonus{/g} to all their {g|Encyclopedia:Characteristic}characteristics{/g} until the end of combat. Stacks.

traits.locale_text: ネメサイトの味方が敵に倒されるたび、その敵の{g|Encyclopedia:Turn}ターン{/g}が終わると直ちに、ネメサイトはその敵をすぐに攻撃する。ネメサイトの味方は戦闘が終了するまで、自分の{g|Encyclopedia:Characteristic}特性{/g}すべてに+5{g|Encyclopedia:Bonus}ボーナス{/g}を得る。この効果はスタックする。

languages.text: 每当涅墨斯特的盟友被敌人杀死时，当该名敌人的{g|Encyclopedia:Turn}回合{/g}结束时，涅墨斯特会立刻攻击该名敌人，且使所有剩余盟友的所有{g|Encyclopedia:Characteristic}属性{/g}{g|Encyclopedia:Bonus}{/g}提高5点。此效果可叠加，持续至战斗结束。
languages.original_text: Whenever Nemesite's ally is killed by an enemy, as soon as that enemy's {g|Encyclopedia:Turn}turn{/g} ends, Nemesite immediately attacks that enemy and grants his allies a +5 {g|Encyclopedia:Bonus}bonus{/g} to all their {g|Encyclopedia:Characteristic}characteristics{/g} until the end of combat. Stacks.

traits.locale_text: 每当涅墨斯特的盟友被敌人杀死时，当该名敌人的{g|Encyclopedia:Turn}回合{/g}结束时，涅墨斯特会立刻攻击该名敌人，且使所有剩余盟友的所有{g|Encyclopedia:Characteristic}属性{/g}{g|Encyclopedia:Bonus}{/g}提高5点。此效果可叠加，持续至战斗结束。

languages.text: Wird ein Verbündeter des Nemesiten von einem Gegner getötet, attackiert der Nemesit diesen Gegner unmittelbar nach dessen {g|Encyclopedia:Turn}Zug{/g} und gewährt seinen Verbündeten bis zum Ende des Kampfes einen {g|Encyclopedia:Bonus}Bonus{/g} von +5 auf ihre {g|Encyclopedia:Characteristic}Eigenschaften{/g}. Stapelbar.
languages.original_text: Whenever Nemesite's ally is killed by an enemy, as soon as that enemy's {g|Encyclopedia:Turn}turn{/g} ends, Nemesite immediately attacks that enemy and grants his allies a +5 {g|Encyclopedia:Bonus}bonus{/g} to all their {g|Encyclopedia:Characteristic}characteristics{/g} until the end of combat. Stacks.

traits.locale_text: Wird ein Verbündeter des Nemesiten von einem Gegner getötet, attackiert der Nemesit diesen Gegner unmittelbar nach dessen {g|Encyclopedia:Turn}Zug{/g} und gewährt seinen Verbündeten bis zum Ende des Kampfes einen {g|Encyclopedia:Bonus}Bonus{/g} von +5 auf ihre {g|Encyclopedia:Characteristic}Eigenschaften{/g}. Stapelbar.

languages.text: Chaque fois qu'un allié de Némésite est tué par un ennemi, à la fin du {g|Encyclopedia:Turn}tour{/g} de cet ennemi, Némésite l'attaque immédiatement et confère à ses alliés un {g|Encyclopedia:Bonus}bonus{/g} de +5 à toutes leurs {g|Encyclopedia:Characteristic}caractéristiques{/g} jusqu'à la fin du combat. Cumulable.
languages.original_text: Whenever Nemesite's ally is killed by an enemy, as soon as that enemy's {g|Encyclopedia:Turn}turn{/g} ends, Nemesite immediately attacks that enemy and grants his allies a +5 {g|Encyclopedia:Bonus}bonus{/g} to all their {g|Encyclopedia:Characteristic}characteristics{/g} until the end of combat. Stacks.

traits.locale_text: Chaque fois qu'un allié de Némésite est tué par un ennemi, à la fin du {g|Encyclopedia:Turn}tour{/g} de cet ennemi, Némésite l'attaque immédiatement et confère à ses alliés un {g|Encyclopedia:Bonus}bonus{/g} de +5 à toutes leurs {g|Encyclopedia:Characteristic}caractéristiques{/g} jusqu'à la fin du combat. Cumulable.

languages.text: Когда противник убивает союзника Немезита, сразу после завершения {g|Encyclopedia:Turn}хода{/g} этого противника Немезит атакует его, а также предоставляет своим союзникам {g|Encyclopedia:Bonus}бонус{/g} +5 ко всем {g|Encyclopedia:Characteristic}характеристикам{/g} до конца боя. Эффект суммируется.
languages.original_text: Whenever Nemesite's ally is killed by an enemy, as soon as that enemy's {g|Encyclopedia:Turn}turn{/g} ends, Nemesite immediately attacks that enemy and grants his allies a +5 {g|Encyclopedia:Bonus}bonus{/g} to all their {g|Encyclopedia:Characteristic}characteristics{/g} until the end of combat. Stacks.

traits.locale_text: Когда противник убивает союзника Немезита, сразу после завершения {g|Encyclopedia:Turn}хода{/g} этого противника Немезит атакует его, а также предоставляет своим союзникам {g|Encyclopedia:Bonus}бонус{/g} +5 ко всем {g|Encyclopedia:Characteristic}характеристикам{/g} до конца боя. Эффект суммируется.

Когда противник убивает союзника Немезита, сразу после завершения {g|Encyclopedia:Turn}хода{/g} этого противника Немезит атакует его, а также предоставляет своим союзникам {g|Encyclopedia:Bonus}бонус{/g} +5 ко всем {g|Encyclopedia:Characteristic}характеристикам{/g} до конца боя. Эффект суммируется.

languages.text: Nemezit'in dost birimi bir düşman tarafından öldürüldüğünde o düşmanın {g|Encyclopedia:Turn}turu{/g} sonlanır sonlanmaz Nemezit, o düşmana saldırır ve dost birimlerinin tüm {g|Encyclopedia:Characteristic}niteliklerine{/g} +5 {g|Encyclopedia:Bonus}bonus{/g} kazandırır. Bu etki, çatışma sonuna dek sürer. Etki üst üste birikebilir.
languages.original_text: Whenever Nemesite's ally is killed by an enemy, as soon as that enemy's {g|Encyclopedia:Turn}turn{/g} ends, Nemesite immediately attacks that enemy and grants his allies a +5 {g|Encyclopedia:Bonus}bonus{/g} to all their {g|Encyclopedia:Characteristic}characteristics{/g} until the end of combat. Stacks.
